response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, and we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or endeavors. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We understand that you might have other considerations, so please let us know if there's any flexibility in terms of payment plans or additional services that could make this offer even more appealing to you. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and bringing this product into your life. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, [Your Name] on behalf of [Your Company]", "product_price": 1150000}
